subject: Weddings and Engagements
Football
lead_paragraph: For Will Beatty and his fiancée, planning a wedding has been a consuming task, one made only more challenging by the reality that Beatty is in the midst of the most important season of his career.
snippet: For Will Beatty and his fiancée, planning a wedding has been a consuming task, one made only more challenging by the reality that Beatty is in the midst of the most important season of his career.
